session_id.description: The session ID related to a single payment flow

started_at.description: The date on which the payment flow was triggered

steps_details.description: The list of each step executed in order to proceed with the payment flow until certain status

PaymentFlow.description: The list of flows executed on certain payment identifier

activate_payment_notice_v2.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'activatePaymentNoticeV2' on NDP. It can be null if the previous status is KO

check_position.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'checkPosition' on NDP. It can be null if the previous status is KO

close_payment_v2.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'closePaymentV2' on NDP. It can be null if the previous status is KO

receipt_ko_send.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'receipt-ko' on WISP (i.e. the send of a KO paaInviaRT to creditor institution). It can be null if the previous status is KO

receipt_ko_send_for_ecommerce_session_ex.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'ecommerce-hang-timeout-trigger' on WISP (i.e. if the user remains too much on ecommerce session opened). It can be null if the previous statuses are all OK

receipt_ko_send_for_payment_token_expire.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'payment-token-timeout-trigger' on WISP (i.e. if the payment token expires during payment processing). It can be null if the previous statuses are all OK

receipt_ko_send_for_rpt_expired.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'rpt-timeout-trigger' on WISP (i.e. if the triggered RPT does not have a following redirect). It can be null if the previous statuses are all OK

receipt_ok_send.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'receipt-ko' on WISP (i.e. the send of an OK paaInviaRT to creditor institution). It can be null if the previous status is KO

redirect.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'redirect' on WISP. It can be null if the previous status is KO

rescheduled_receipt_send.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'receipt-resend-[ok|ko]' on WISP (i.e. the re-send of a paaInviaRT to creditor institution). It can be null if the previous status is OK

send_payment_outcome_v2.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'sendPaymentOutcomeV2' on NDP. It can be null if the previous status is KO

trigger_primitive.description: The status of success or failure related to the step 'trigger primitive' on WISP (i.e. nodoInviaRPT, nodoInviaCarrelloRPT)

PaymentFlowDetail.description: The status for each macro-step in the payment flow, defining if something went wrong during process

number_of_flows_found.description: The number of total flow found on certain payment identifier

show_payloads_in_interface_statuses.description: The flag that permits to enable the display of request and response payloads in INTERFACE events
